an6.47:1.1: Atha kho moliyasivako paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an6.47:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho moliyasivako paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.47:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti?
an6.47:2.1: “Tena hi, sivaka, tannevettha patipucchami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
an6.47:2.3: santam va ajjhattam lobham ‘atthi me ajjhattam lobho’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam lobham ‘natthi me ajjhattam lobho’ti pajanasi”ti?
an6.47:2.5: “Yam kho tvam, sivaka, santam va ajjhattam lobham ‘atthi me ajjhattam lobho’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam lobham ‘natthi me ajjhattam lobho’ti pajanasi—
an6.47:2.6: evampi kho, sivaka, sanditthiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an6.47:3.6: santam va ajjhattam mohadhammam ‘atthi me ajjhattam mohadhammo’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam mohadhammam ‘natthi me ajjhattam mohadhammo’ti pajanasi”ti?
an6.47:3.8: “Yam kho tvam, sivaka, santam va ajjhattam mohadhammam ‘atthi me ajjhattam mohadhammo’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam mohadhammam ‘natthi me ajjhattam mohadhammo’ti pajanasi—
an6.47:3.9: evam kho, sivaka, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti.
an6.47:4.2: upasakam mam, bhante, bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
